column4: Hey Guys, Is there a way to change your GUI from Xubuntu to Gnome ?? if so how ??
Sorry, I got it backwards, do as katakaio says...
and that will change the GUI ?? I cant stand XUbuntu
dident work this is the error that i am getting " E: Invalid operation ubuntu-desktop

2008-03-05T02:48:00.000Z	Odd-rationale	grezer34	Do sudo aptitude install ubuntu-desktop
2008-03-05T02:51:00.000Z	grezer34	prince_jammys	sudo apt-get ubuntu-desktop
